title: M4: Overturned lorry shuts motorway - BBC News
summary: m4 closed west-bound from j8/9 to j10 .
lorry overturned blocking the west-bound carriageway .
fire crews were called at 12:52 bst and released one man from the lorry .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: the bbc live page has now closed .
tune to bbc radio berkshire for the latest updates on the m4 closure on thursday morning .

documents.title: repair work begins
text: # m4 w/b closure j8 - j10 .
our contractors continue to work hard at the scene where an hgv overturned .
recovery + barrier repairs in progress

documents.title: m4 lorry crash near maidenhead leads to 17-hour closure
text: a lorry has overturned on the m4 closing a westbound section between maidenhead and reading for 17 hours .
read the full bbc story here .

documents.title: junction 8 to junction 10 closed until 'at least 06:00 on thursday '
text: if you 're planning on travelling # m4 ( w ) j8 - j10 .
closure will remain in place through the night .
diversion details :

documents.title: recap of 17-hour closure after hgv crash
text: the m4 remains closed westbound between junctions 8/9 and 10 after an hgv crossed the central reservation and overturned at lunchtime .
it is not expected to reopen until 06:00 on thursday .
one lane is also closed eastbound .
about 300m of the central reservation has been damaged , along with a light coloum and some of the road surface .
the lorry shed its load of garden waste and `` a large quantity of diesel '' .
the driver has been taken to hospital with a serious head injury .
for the latest check the highways england updates page .

documents.title: 300m of central reservation damaged
text: about 300m of the central reservation and a light column have been damaged following the hgv crash , highways england has said following initial inspections .
it said the road would also have to be resurfaced because the hgv had spilled `` a large quantity of diesel '' onto the carriageway .

documents.title: crashed hgv 'being recovered '
text: recovery of the overturned hgv in operation # m4 w/b closure j8 - j10 remains in place .
diversion details here :

documents.title: tailbacks are growing
text: it 's all to do with the load of mulch on the motorway .

documents.title: lorry has shed 30 tonnes of garden waste
text: the lorry was carrying 30 tonnes of garden waste when it overturned , which will need to be cleared before the westbound lane of the m4 re-opens .

documents.title: m4 closed until the morning
text: m4 closed until the morning

documents.title: from our man at the scene
text: `` the central reservation is lying like an elastic band . ''

text: traffic england are now reporting they expect traffic conditions on the eastbound carriageway to return to normal by 22:30 , with delays of up to 90 minutes expected right now .

documents.title: around 80m of the central reservation on the m4 needs to be repaired
text: radio berkshire has learned 80 metres of the central reservation on the m4 , about the length of two football pitches , needs to be repaired by highways england .
it could take a while

documents.title: latest from bbc radio berkshire travel
text: latest from bbc radio berkshire travel
author: Colleen Joynt
BBC Radio Berkshire travel

documents.title: congestion on a4 between reading and maidenhead
text: roads in reading and on the a4 and in maidenhead are all looking congested as rush hour hits its peak due to the m4 closure .

documents.title: highways england say they have cleared half the stranded vehicles on m4
text: tony barrow from highways england told bbc radio berkshire 's phil kennedy : `` we 've managed to do some clean up on the hard shoulder lane that 's allowing vehicles to slowly pass the scene .
we 're around halfway through the vehicles that were stranded . ''
police are still investigating the incident , as the driver is injured , but once they have finished the clear-up can begin so the road can re-open .
`` we 've got all our teams there ready to go , we 've got diversion routes in place at the moment . ''
as soon as we 've got more updates we 'll pass them on to you . ''
you can hear more by staying tuned to bbc radio berkshire .

documents.title: view of the congestion towards junction 10 of m4
text: looking east toward london and west toward jct 10 # m4 @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: highways england : diversions are in place
text: drivers are being advised by highways england that the westbound m4 is closed between junction 10 and junction 8/9 and one lane closed eastbound near reading .
the westbound carriageway remains closed following an incident involving an overturned lorry , which happened just before 1pm .
one lane remains closed on the eastbound carriageway but additional lane closures may be required later to repair the barrier .
a clearly signed diversion is in place following the hollow square symbol via the a329 ( m ) , a4 , a3290 and a404 ( m ) .
highways england is working hard with the emergency services to reopen the road as soon as it is safe to do so .
once thames valley police has completed an investigation , extensive repairs will need to be carried out to the road before it can be safely reopened .
author: Highways England

documents.title: lorry driver 'suffered serious head injury '
text: south central ambulance have said they were called out at 12.44 .
a standard ambulance and an air ambulance were sent to the scene to treat the lorry driver who had suffered a serious head injury .
he was then airlifted to the john radcliffe hospital in oxford .

documents.title: m4 closed west-bound
text: a lorry has overturned on the m4 near maidenhead , causing tailbacks in both directions .
fire crews confirmed they were called to the scene at 12:52 bst and released one man from the lorry .
the motorway is closed between junctions 8/9 and 10 after the lorry shed its load over two carriageways .
we will be bringing you all the latest through rush hour this evening .
we are dealing with a serious collision m4 jct 8/9 to 10 .
the clear up is expected to take several hours .
clearly demonstrates the inherent weakness of the barrier system , and why the motorway # speed limit should not be raised .

this is what they are designed to do
the weakness is barriers appear to have failed to stop a vehicle from crossing to opposite c'way : missing posts give clue
